# MLBoundingBoxAnchor.center

**Case**

An anchor at the bounding box’s center point.

## Declaration

```swift
case center
```

## Designating anchors

- **MLBoundingBoxAnchor.topLeft**: An anchor at the bounding box’s top-left corner.
- **MLBoundingBoxAnchor.bottomLeft**: An anchor at the bounding box’s bottom-left corner.
